data.text: @WalesOnline Fuck Off with your shit nonsense

@andrea_pocknell @WalesOnline I know tons of people who have it right now, I had it last week after avoiding it for two years, guess what everyone I know has had worse hangovers including me. Nobody is getting anything more than a mild cold. We do not need restrictions for that!

@WalesOnline No one gives a shit anymore just get on wit life ffs
@MJVMediaMikeV @WalesOnline Seriously your possibly one of many with same options though if you’d caught this early on while Delta was dominant strain doubt you’d be so adhoc concerning Co-vid ..
